This may take up to 10 seconds Switch Call Not a valid phone number Android Permissions TeleConsole will ask you for access to use your microphone so you will be able to talk into the phone TeleConsole will ask for access to your Phone so you will be able to place and receive calls TeleConsole will ask for access to your File System so you can download voicemails and faxes TeleConsole will ask for access to your Contacts so you can use them from the app TeleConsole will ask for access to Nearby Devices so that you should be able to connect to Bluetooth Start Asking Phone Number Are you sure you want to delete the team? If you have a filter, and this issue comes up all the time, please ask them to bypass push.telebroad.com and push2.telebroad.com for VoIP calls Call Started Open %2$s file %1$s Attachment Copy Image Downloaded Share Invalid Phone Number Sorry, This does not look like a real phone number Some carriers block VoIP calls. TLS prevents them from seeing that the TeleConsole calls are VoIP calls. We therefore recommend keeping TLS on Ignore Group Calls This call does not exist Unsupported operation This Call Does not exist Ongoing Call Call on hold Speaker Speaker Off Unhold Dialing Sorry, we can\'t find an active fax number for your account. Please contact support to enable fax for a number on your account. No Fax Lines Active Call Notification This is the notification shown when the app has an active call. Due to Android OS constraints, if you disable these notifications, your CALLS WILL STOP when the app goes in the background SIP Notification This is the notification shown when the app connects to the server when the app is in the background. Due to Android OS constraints, this notification is required to allow the app to check for incoming calls, even when the app is in the background. If you disable these notifications, incoming calls might NOT COME IN Fax sent, check your email for status Everything marked as read Error marking everything as read TeleConsole Call Started No Microphone Permissions We don\'t have permission to use your microphone. We cannot make phone calls without using your microphone.
